Today in Caithness, it's looking solid with 4 ft @11s NNW swell and a moderate 17 mph SE wind. Best spots include Point of Ness and Dunnet Bay, both working well during the mid-tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop as the swell shifts to 4 ft @6s ESE with fresh 29 mph E winds, making it blown out. The day after, expect 7 ft @8s SE swell with strong 34 mph SE winds, keeping it poor across the board. Best: today.
